articles.description: Bank of Baroda (BoB) shares surged more than 2% to  ₹168 apiece on the BSE in Monday's trading session
articles.content: Shares of Bank of Baroda (BoB) surged more than 2% to 168 apiece on the BSE in Monday's trading session after the lender said it has declared highest ever quarterly standalone net profit of 3,853 cro… [+2393 chars]
